content: **crochet dolls peter and pernille in drops muskat** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ height approx 25 cm without hair materials with this quantity you can make both dolls drops muskat from garnstudio 50 g colour no 08 off-white 50 g colour no 09 brown 50 g colour no 60 blue 50 g colour no 10 flesh colour 50 g colour no 06 rose only for pernille drops glitter from garnstudio 1 roll colour no 04 rose only for pernille drops crochet hook size 5mm accessories cotton wool for filling **pattern links ** french version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=b13&d_id=33
